attributes.action: Give the nurses a 10% pay rise!
attributes.additional_details: Because they have it in their power to approve a decent rise of at least 10% in thanks and praise of all our NHS nurses
attributes.background:
After working themselves to the point of exhaustion, saving our lives and holding the hands of the those who didn’t make it... a 1% pay rise for our nursing staff is an insult
They deserve more than us clapping on a Thursday night..... give them a decent payrise!!!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
